channel.title: Positioning sprites and buttons
channel.description: My question is how do you position sprites, a guy on teamviewer positioned something for me, but the numbers he used for it was different from the x and y mouse coords on the data. How do i figure out the numbers to position sprites and then buttons also.

item.title: Positioning sprites and buttons
item.dc:creator: @cruel_ko cruel ko
item.description:

My question is how do you position sprites, a guy on teamviewer positioned something for me, but the numbers he used for it was different from the x and y mouse coords on the data. How do i figure out the numbers to position sprites and then buttons also.
